law.catch_line: Information on cotton fields and patches to be furnished to Commissioner.
law.text: Every person growing cotton in this state shall furnish to the Commissioner, on forms supplied by the Commissioner, information that the Commissioner requires regarding the size and location of all commercial cotton fields and of noncommercial patches of cotton grown as ornamentals or for other purposes.
law.history: Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 4, effective June 26, 2007.
